name: Emi - New Beginning
description:
From the moment that Emi arrives on your doorstep you'll be learning about this little firecracker. Like a raw diamond, she's been shaped and polished into the confident, charming young woman before you. In this adult visual novel, you learn about her time away, what she missed while she was gone, and most importantly, what she wants from the future. You'll experience how her newfound passion ignites a whole new chapter in your relationship with her, with romance, humour, and of course, sex.

Gameplay includes:
  • 12,000 Words of compelling story
  • 165+ Full 4k renders
  • 10+ 4K Animations
